title: Accounting Department Support Fund
description: To provide discretionary support for the Accounting Department at the University of Colorado Denver.
marketingContent: The CU Denver Accounting program thrives as one of 5% of programs worldwide with the prestigious AACSB accounting accreditation. Our students are part of a diverse community of analytical professionals who are ready to start or advance their careers in accounting and meet the growing needs of our accounting and business community. Our students are not only prepared and motivated to pass the CPA exam, but they graduate from our program with a well-rounded set of skills to take on the 21st century evolving landscape in the accounting space.
